arabic_text: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
translation: (5) For they had denied the truth when it came to them, but there is going to reach them the news of what they used to ridicule.[293]
footnotes: [293]- They will experience the reality of what they had denied and the consequence of their denial.
